synopsis.text:
Otomon and their human counterparts, known as Riders, coexist harmoniously in a world teeming with monsters and people. These Riders, using their sacred Kizuna Ishi, unlock the dormant powers of their Otomon, forming a unique bond with them. Aspiring to become the greatest Rider, a young boy named Ryuto embarks on a quest to find his own Otomon.

In the quaint village of Hakum, Ryuto's journey begins just as he turns 12, eager to locate his Otomon before the ceremony where he receives his Kizuna Ishi. Accompanied by his empathetic childhood friend Cheval, the ever-curious Lilia, and his steadfast partner Naville, Ryuto ventures deep into the heart of the forest. There, he encounters the mythical Rathalos, marking the beginning of an extraordinary adventure.

Adapted from the renowned Capcom franchise, Monster Hunter, this anime series is brought to life by the visionary team behind Jojo's Bizarre Adventure. Delve into a world where humans and monsters forge unbreakable bonds, as Ryuto and his newfound Otomon explore the depths of their connection.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
